        WrongLoginInputException - in case login fails
        CompanyAlreadyExistException - in case Company already exist
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • test34_cleanDB

        @DirtiesContext(methodMode=BEFORE_METHOD)
public void test34_cleanDB()
                                                               throws WrongLoginInputException,
                                                                      java.lang.InterruptedException
        This method is used in order to clean the DB from data Since I use @DirtiesContext annotation , it will automatically clean the cache of the DB and all data will be cleared
        Throws:
        WrongLoginInputException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
